value:
Just look how those waves sparkle.
If only my parents were here to enjoy
this beautiful scenery.

If I were sunburned, I'd be out of
commission for a while, so I'm taking
all the necessary precautions.

Take care you don't get too much
sun exposure. Wouldn't want to wake
up tomorrow with a nasty sunburn.

To be honest, I've never worn a
swimsuit before. Am I doing it right?

Though sunlight is dangerous in
excess, in moderation, it can palliate
certain mental and physical ailments.

Excuse me. My name is Rhys. I'm just
checking in on you, like your friend
$Nf asked me to.$k$pHow are you feeling? Drinking lots of
water to prevent heat stroke, I trust?

Splendid! The temperate weather
must be doing me some good.

Maybe if I push myself, I can swim
a bit farther next time.

I'm feeling woozy... Perhaps I need to
lie in the shade for a while.

Thank you. I'll always treasure this
sweet summer memory.

I am Rhys. I may appear frail, but I'm
one of the Greil Mercenaries. I heard
we'll be fighting on the beach?

I can't thank you enough for taking
me on this splendid outing to the
oceanside.$k$pThe Greil Mercenaries were often
ambushed at ports and beaches, so
I was a little nervous at first.$k$pBut as it happens, the fresh air and
sunshine have done my fragile
constitution some good.$k$pI wish everyone could be so lucky
as to experience a refreshing day
at the beach.$k$pMaybe someday, if I can help you
restore peace to this land, that wish
will come true.
はいっ
Stop!
うっ…
いけない…！
This is the end!
Drown, why don't you!
The waves are high!
Enjoy the sun.
I feel seasick...
Haha...
Are you hot?
Take care out there!
The sun can be hard on your body. Stick to the shade and drink lots of water!
If my parents could see me healthy and having fun at the beach, they'd be so happy.
Shouldn't we take a break soon? I don't want anyone worried about me.
*breathing heavily* No, don't worry. I'm OK. I'm a little hot, but I'm ready to go!
The reason the beach is so much fun is because we get to enjoy it together.
Let's go!
What to do now...
Me too!
